name: uk.half-shot.bridge
description: This event is sent to display information about a bridge that is present in the room.
state: The bridge's prefix, followed by the protocol id, followed by the network id, followed by the channel id.

content.name: bridgebot
content.description: The MXID of the bridge bot. Note that the sender of this event is not always the bridge bot.

content.name: creator
content.description: The MXID of the user who provisioned the bridge. This value can be omitted if the creator is unknown.

content.name: protocol
content.description: The protocol that is being bridged.

content.name: network
content.description: The specific network the bridge is connected to.

content.name: channel
content.description: The specific channel the bridge is connected to.

Channel.name: id
Channel.description: Id of the channel that is being bridged to.

Channel.name: displayname
Channel.description: Human readable identifier for the channel.

Channel.name: avatar
Channel.description: MXC URI that refers to an image of the channel.

Channel.name: external_url
Channel.description: Link to a connected channel so users may view the bridge on the other side.

Network.name: id
Network.description: Id of the network that is being bridged to.

Network.name: displayname
Network.description: Human readable identifier for the network.

Network.name: avatar
Network.description: MXC URI that refers to an image of the network.

Network.name: external_url
Network.description: Link to a connected network as an identifier of the network.

Protocol.name: id
Protocol.description: Id of the protocol that is being bridged to.

Protocol.name: displayname
Protocol.description: Human readable identifier for the protocol.

Protocol.name: avatar
Protocol.description: MXC URI that refers to an image of the protocol.

Protocol.name: external_url
Protocol.description: Link to the protocol, either providing information or referring to a relevant page for the bridge.
